title: Grocery Shopping
description: Pick up milk, eggs, chicken breast, and ingredients for Sunday meal prep.

title: Renew Gym Membership
description: Update credit card information on the portal and sign the new annual waiver.

title: Oil Change
description: Take the car to the mechanic for routine maintenance and tire pressure check.

title: Water Indoor Plants
description: Check soil moisture for the fiddle leaf fig and add fertilizer to the pothos.

title: Clean Kitchen Counters
description: Wipe down all surfaces and organize the spice rack.
